content.prompt: Which of the following international organizations were founded upon principles that were in direct opposition to the approach to international politics advocated in the second paragraph?

choices.label: Regional trade agreements such as ASEAN and Mercosur
International economic institutions promoting free trade, such as the International Monetary Fund and the World Bank
Cold War military alliances such as NATO and the Warsaw Pact
Collective security and cooperation organizations, such as the League of Nations and the United Nations

topic.text: 9.8: Institutions Developing in a Globalized World

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
